calendar.description: House Economic Development and Workforce Services Hearing

general_provisions: This bill addresses reporting related to water use and data centers.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>directs land use authorities to issue certain notices;<hr><ltbullet>requires certain large data centers to communicate with water providers;<hr><ltbullet>requires reporting by operators of certain data centers before construction and annually;<hr><ltbullet>addresses disclosure of the reported information;<hr><ltbullet>provides for enforcement mechanisms;<hr><ltbullet>addresses rulemaking; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming amendments.
